short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that allows the user to track passed time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your tasks with Simple Timer! This straightforward Chrome extension helps you track time with minimal effort. Whether you're managing work sessions or personal tasks, Simple Timer offers an easy way to start, pause, and stop a timer directly from your browser.

Key Features:

Straightforward Design: Simple and effective controls for starting, pausing, and stopping the timer.
Minimalist Functionality: Focus on what matters with no unnecessary customizations.
Focused Interaction: Open the timer interface to view and manage your time.
Simple Timer is the perfect no-frills solution for anyone looking to manage their time without distractions.
